ClaimFinancialSettings.name: ClaimFinancialSettings
ClaimFinancialSettings.description: Represents the configuration settings for Insurance Claim Financial Services.

ClaimCovPendingAuthStatus.description: The status of pending financial authority for claim coverage.

ClaimPendingAuthorityStatus.description: The status of pending financial authority for claim.

ClmCovPymtDtlPendAuthSts.description: The status of pending financial authority for claim coverage payment detail.

DeveloperName.description: The unique name for the claim financial settings object.

Language.description: The language of the claim finanical settings.

ManageableState.description: Indicates the manageable state of the specified component that is contained in a package.

MasterLabel.description: Tne unique label that identifies the claim finanical settings throughout the Salesforce user interface.

NamespacePrefix.description: Namespace prefix associated with this object. Each Developer Edition org that creates a managed package has a unique namespace prefix.
